attributes.action: Do not band breeds but bring in restrictions for all dog owners.
attributes.additional_details:
This would be easier for the police force to monitor. Any dog without a muzzle would be fined.  

Every dog to wear a muzzle whilst out walking.
attributes.background:
Make it mandatory for every dog to wear a muzzle whilst out walking in public, instead of the police force trying to hunt down certain types of breeds. 
This would stop all dog fights and any risk to humans.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar actions:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Make all dogs no matter what breed muzzled in public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633198
